meanings.sent1: The complementariness of peanut butter and jelly is well-known.
meanings.sent2: The chef emphasized the complementariness of flavors in the dish.
meanings.sent3: The complementariness of socks and sandals is a fashion faux pas.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship had a natural complementariness, like yin and yang.
meanings.sent5: The complementariness of black and white creates a timeless elegance.

meanings.definition: The quality of combining well with something else.
meanings.sent1: The complementariness of the colors in the painting was striking.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the complementariness of her skills and her friend's skills.
meanings.sent3: The complementariness of the puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent4: The complementariness of music and dance is evident in this performance.
meanings.sent5: The complementariness of sweet and savory flavors made the dish unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The relationship between two things that enhance each other when combined.
meanings.sent1: The complementariness of teamwork is essential for success.
meanings.sent2: The complementariness of the ingredients made the recipe a hit.
meanings.sent3: The complementariness of laughter and joy filled the room.
meanings.sent4: Their complementariness in problem-solving made them a great team.
meanings.sent5: The complementariness of sun and water creates a beautiful rainbow.
